name: Community Environment Day at Sunny View Junior and Senior Public School

location.name: Sunny View Junior and Senior Public School

description:
Join Councillor Chernos Lin (Ward 15) and the City of Toronto to help reduce the amount of waste going to landfill. Drop off household items for donation, electronics for reuse or recycling and household hazardous waste for proper disposal. 

Pick up free bagged compost while supplies last and kitchen catchers for organics ($7 each â€“ cash, debit and credit accepted).
